privacy.title: Privacy Isn't Optional
privacy.description: In a world where your data is constantly harvested, we take a different approach. Your family's privacy is our top priority—not an afterthought.

yourDataYourControl.title: Your Data, Your Control
yourDataYourControl.description: We never sell, share, or use your data for advertising. Your family information belongs to you alone.

endToEndEncryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEndEncryption.description: All sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest, ensuring maximum security.

selfHostingFreedom.title: Self-Hosting Freedom
selfHostingFreedom.description: Host Famly on your own infrastructure with our easy Docker setup. Complete control, zero compromises.

zeroTracking.title: Zero Tracking
zeroTracking.description: No analytics, no tracking pixels, no third-party scripts. We respect your privacy completely.

dataPortability.title: Data Portability
dataPortability.description: Export your data anytime in standard formats. No lock-in, no barriers to leaving.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Our code is open for inspection. Verify our security claims and contribute to the project.

promise.title: Our Privacy Promise
promise.description: We will never sell your data. We will never use it for advertising. We will never share it with third parties. Your family's information is sacred, and we treat it that way. This isn't just a policy—it's our core principle.
